Package core

Provides the classes necessary for core functions: Main, I/O (game data, logger, languages), ...

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IConfig
    Interface for Config.
    ILanguages
    Interface for Languages.
    IMain  
    IRessourceCache  
    IStation
    Interface for a Station on the map.
    IStationMap
    Interface for the StationMap.
    ITimer
    The Timer is used for tracking the time a mainloop and other specific tasks take. with getDelta the time since the last function call is tracked, getTime() returns the current time.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Config
    the configuration-file-object for the game.
    FileLoader
    The FileLoader class is used to do the input file services.
    FileScanner
    This Class is used for static filesystem-scanning methods
    Languages
    Reads all languages.
    Main
    The mainclass of the game, completely rebuild, for version 2.0.
    MainFrame
    Contains the main frame.
    RessourceCache
    scanning the filesystem for map files and savegames create and hold filedependend configuration objects
    Station
    The Class holds information about a point on the map.
    StationMap
    No function yet.
    Timer
    The timer used for the main loop.

Package core Description

Provides the classes necessary for core functions: Main, I/O (game data, logger, languages), ...
